message: JSONL logging implementation NOT active in running MCP server. Test results: (1) BLOCKING: Logs directory not created - /logs/ doesn't exist in workspace after agent deployment. (2) BLOCKING: get_agent_output tail parameter not functional - tail=10 returns 32K+ tokens indicating fallback to tmux. (3) Root cause: Code changes in real_mcp_server.py NOT loaded - MCP server needs restart to pick up new deploy_headless_agent and get_agent_output implementations.

tail_parameter_test.result: FAIL - tail parameter ignored, using tmux fallback

blocking_issues: deploy_headless_agent not using tee pipe for JSONL capture
get_agent_output not reading from JSONL logs
data.root_cause: MCP server running old code - changes to real_mcp_server.py not loaded
data.required_action: Restart MCP server to load new code from real_mcp_server.py
data.code_verification_status: import_checker_agent reports all imports present, code_verification_agent verifying code sections
data.impact: JSONL logging feature completely non-functional - all 707 lines of new code not active
